summary:
Senior Finance leader with multiple international roles as Finance Director / CFO, deputy GM and currently Director of Transformation. An experience gained during twenty years of international assignments at Operating Company (country), Region and Corporate (headquarter) levels, and through cross functional roles held in Finance, Commerce and Supply Chain. Non Executive Board role at SCC Portugal with minorities interest.

Business and results oriented, pragmatic and showing high levels of energy combined with team spirit and engagement skills. Multiple experiences on leading and developing teams in totally different environments, and on dealing with stakeholders (internal and external) by leveraging collaboration and business partnering behaviours. 

Andrea gets energized by setting the startegy, by shaping the way forward and by achieving business performance improvements. Andrea is hands on, teamplayer and believes in achieving success through team. 

Bachelor's degrees in International Economy at the Università Commerciale 'Luigi Bocconi', and in Business Administration at the European Business School.
